om.equation
Class Sum

java.lang.Object
  om.equation.LimitsThing
      om.equation.Sum
All Implemented Interfaces:
SuperSubHolder.EatsOwnSuperSub
public class Sum
extends LimitsThing
implements SuperSubHolder.EatsOwnSuperSub

Displays sum using sigma notation

fEndSlope

protected float fEndSlope
Italic slope of end character (e.g. if the character has width 100, height 10, and italic slope 0.5 then it is considered to extend to 100,0 but only to 95,10 (the bottom edge ends (italic slope) * (height) pixels left)

convertTextSize

public int convertTextSize(int iTextSize)
Converts a constant to an actual pixel size. (Note that if equations are being scaled for accessibility, the graphics context will be scaled when drawn, so we don't need to use different sizes here.)

Parameters:
iTextSize - TEXTSIZE_xxx constant
Returns:
Actual size in pixels
